songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I just (sway)
I just, I just (slatt)
(Lean, sway) I just
I just (Sway, lean, hey)
Ohh, aye
Wheezy Beatz
(Sway, sway, sway, hee)

[Bridge 1]
I just want you to
I just want you to
I just want you to
I-I just want you to
I just want you to be you (be yourself or else)
I just, I just want you to be you (I said be yourself or else, woah)
I just... I just, I just, I just (woo)
I just, I just, I just
I just, I just, I just, I just want you to be you
I just, I just, I just, I just want you to be you

[Verse 1]
All times, I just want you to be you (woo, sway)
At all times, I just want you to be you (remain yourself)
If you want tatas, bae, you just gotta be you (remain yourself)
If you want my child, bae, you gotta continue to be you
You gotta be you, let them other bitches just hear you
Gotta do it just like I told you to do
You gotta do it 'cause that's what you were supposed to do (idigg)
You gotta drip sauce on the whole crew (you gotta drip sauce)
You gotta drip sauce 'til your diamonds Fruit Loops (ya digg)
Different colors, big booger, 80 pointers, yeah yeah
All the bitches, can't hate, and they ain't joining, yeah yeah
Make them hoes, wash the dishes, do the laundry, yeah yeah

[Bridge 2]
All the bitches, I just want, big assumptions
Big assumptions, I just want, big assumptions
I just, I just, I just want you to be you
Big assumptions, make big assumptions
Big assumptions, I just want you to be you
Be be be be be be you
Be be be be be be you
Be be be be be be you

[Verse 2]
Don't be nobody else, just be yourself, bae
Gotta do it real real good, can save me yourself bae
Gotta oh, oh, oh, oh, I just wanna [?]
And won't you style on 'em, bae, stylin'
And don't play with 'em, bae, go to wylin'
Take the whole whole family to an island
Christopher Columbus, bae, you the [?]
I'm on a boat, no Gilligan island
Play with your bae, bae get to wylin'
Nigga can't go wild loudin'
I pay the Rolls Royce, and go get to childin'
Be home in about two hours
Fifty-seven hunna, bae, be on the island
Drip drip, gon' solve me wylin'
Drip drip to the spot in Highland
Big bags, [?]
Woo woo, yeah [?] watchin'
We take a foreign, do [?]
We hopped inside a foreign, dropped the top, woah woah
We hopped inside a foreign, dropped the top, leave you stylin'
Hey, aye

[Outro]
Aye, I don't wanna worry about fixing this motherfucker
You know what I'm sayin'?
That's a real freestyle right off the top, you know what I'm sayin'?
I swear to God
One take, you understand what I'm sayin'?
Bake the cake, bae, bitch, eat that up
Thugger! I meant Jeffery! Yeah, udigg?
See, I had to go back to being myself, you know what I'm sayin'?
First I was someone else, I was Young Thug
That's exactly who I wanted to be like
You know what I'm sayin'?
Now I'm back to myself, I'm Jeffery
Fuckin' hoes, Hugh Heffley, Hugh Heffley, yeah
Jeffery, Hugh Heffley, udigg? Hahaha
Eat that up, you know what I'm sayin'?
Timeless music! ENT!
Hah!
songs.title: Be You
